content: Does anyone know what the status is of all the futures-*-preview crates on crates.io? Some seem quite heavily used still, but they haven't been updated in years. @Taylor Cramer?
Aren't those just all outdated and need their dependents updated?
i'm assuming they shouldn't be used or updated anymore, and all that code moved to actively maintained projects. but i'm not sure.
Yup, futures-preview was a staging ground back in the day so that we could be clear to users about which releases they should be considering for production-ish uses.
